steps.title: Foundations
steps.objective: Build essential groundwork for your career

children.title: Computer Basics
children.objective: Master essential computer skills for your career
tasks: Install VS Code and configure extensions
Learn basic terminal commands (cd, ls, mkdir, touch)
Set up version control with Git

children.title: Math & Logic Basics
children.objective: Build analytical thinking foundation

steps.title: Core Skills Development
steps.objective: Master essential skills for Mobile Developer
tasks: Set up practice projects for each skill
Find a mentor or study group

children.title: Swift Mastery
children.objective: Develop proficiency in swift for Mobile Developer

children.title: Kotlin Mastery
children.objective: Develop proficiency in kotlin for Mobile Developer

children.title: React Native Mastery
children.objective: Develop proficiency in react native for Mobile Developer
tasks: Practice react native with hands-on exercises
Build a small react native project

children.title: Flutter Mastery
children.objective: Develop proficiency in flutter for Mobile Developer

steps.title: Portfolio Development
steps.objective: Create impressive projects to showcase your skills

children.title: Portfolio Project 1
children.objective: Build a showcase project demonstrating core skills
tasks: Set up project repository on GitHub

children.title: Portfolio Project 2
children.objective: Build an advanced project showing specialization
tasks: Choose a more complex project idea

steps.title: Specialization Development
steps.objective: Develop expertise in specific areas of your field

children.title: Specialization Track A
children.objective: Deep dive into primary specialization area
tasks: Write technical blog post about specialization

children.title: Specialization Track B
children.objective: Explore complementary specialization

steps.title: Job Search & Application
steps.objective: Land your first role in the field

children.title: Professional Branding
children.objective: Create compelling professional presence
tasks: Create resume tailored to target roles

children.title: Interview Preparation
children.objective: Master technical and behavioral interviews
tasks: Research common interview questions for role

children.title: Job Search Strategy
children.objective: Execute systematic job search campaign
tasks: Set up job alerts on multiple platforms
Reach out to professionals for informational interviews
